job description:
Tech Stack: Java 1.8, Spring Boot, Java Script, Spring MVC, Core Java EE fundamentals, Hibernate/any Object relation mappers, Rest API, Relevant experience: At least 6-8 years
Technical skills:

-Proven hands-on Software Development & implementation experience on Rest API preferably in Big Data Stack.
-Proven working experience in Java development starting with design, build, test & implementation of applications using Java EE platforms
-Hands on experience in the Spring Framework
-Experience in configuration and deployment of RESTful API using APIGEE
-Hands on experience in build and deploying web applications in Tomcat, JBOSS web servers.
-Object Oriented analysis and design using common design patterns.
-Profound insight of Java and JEE internals (Class loading, Memory Management, Transaction management etc.)
-Excellent knowledge of HBASE, SQL and ORM technologies (JPA2, Hibernate)
-Experience in big data technologies - at least Hive & HBASE
-Experience in developing web applications using at least one popular web framework (JSF, Wicket, GWT, Spring MVC)
-Knowledge of Angular JS or React is a plus.
-Proven experience with debugging and providing solutions for latency & request/ response timeout issues and coordination with external teams until successful resolution of issues.
-Experience in working with version control tools (GIT preferred).
-Experience working in agile methodology
